Alley.name: Alley
Alley.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 1 random [[Revealing|Hidden]] item into a {{B|Skull}}.

AllSeeing.name: Prophecy
AllSeeing.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 9 random items.
After [[Equipping|Equipping]] 3 items, [[Losing|Lose]].

Amulet.name: Amulet
Amulet.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Winning|Win]].
If you would [[Losing|Lose]] and this is [[Revealing|Hidden]], [[Revealing|Reveals]] itself and [[Breaking|Breaks]] instead.

AnotherWorld.name: Yarn
AnotherWorld.description: After [[Equipping|Equipping]] 12 items, [[Morphing|Morph]] all [[Revealing|Hidden]] items into {{B|Skull|Skulls}}.

Ant.name: Ant
Ant.description: Every 2 [[Equipping|Equips]], [[Breaking|Break]] the item right of this, [[Swapping|Swap]] with it, and [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item.

Anvil.name: Anvil
Anvil.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] the items below this.
When you [[Equipping|Equip]] one, [[Morphing|Morph]] the other into an {{B|Anvil}} and [[Breaking|Break]] this.

Armageddon.name: Nuke
Armageddon.description: After [[Equipping|Equipping]] 3 items, [[Breaking|Break]] this and all but the outer rim of items.

Ash.name: Ash
Ash.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Modifier|Lock]] 12 random items.
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item to [[Modifier|Unlock]].
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Auto.name: Bot
Auto.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Equipping|Equips]] a random item near this.

Axe.name: Axe
Axe.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item to [[Breaking|Break]]. [[Morphing|Morph]] the items to its left and right into it.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Backpack.name: Backpack
Backpack.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, this performs its "On [[Equipping|Equip]]:" effect.

Ballot.name: Ballot
Ballot.description: You can only [[Equipping|Equip]] 9 [[Revealing|Revealed]] items.

Bank.name: Bank
Bank.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 33% chance for this to gain [[Gold|1 Gold]].

Bankrupt.name: Sinkhole
Bankrupt.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: Lose all your [[Gold|Gold]].

Barrier.name: Barrier
Barrier.description:
Nearby items can't be [[Breaking|Broken]].
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item to [[Swapping|Swap]] this with.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Basket.name: Basket (OLD)
Basket.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 7 random [[Revealing|Hidden]] items into {{B|Fruit}} and [[Breaking|Break]] this.

Fruit.name: Fruit (OLD)
Fruit.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If 7 or more {{B|Fruit}} are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.description: If you would [[Losing|Lose]], [[Winning|Win]] and erase this Gift instead.

Bed.name: Bed
Bed.description: After [[Equipping|Equipping]] 3 items, [[Revealing|Reveal]] 3 random items.

Bell.name: Bell
Bell.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If at least 8 items are [[Breaking|Broken]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Bench.name: Bench
Bench.description: Immediately [[Unequipping|Unequip]] every 7th item you [[Equipping|Equip]].

BigBomb.name: Big Bomb
BigBomb.description: After [[Equipping|Equipping]] 3 items, explodes, [[Breaking|Breaking]] all items within 2 spaces.

BigBrain.name: Brain
BigBrain.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item near this.

Bill.name: Bill
Bill.description: Every 10 [[Equipping|Equips]], Spend [[Gold|1 Gold]]. If you can't, [[Losing|Lose]].

Bird.name: Bird
Bird.description:
After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 25% chance to [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item near this.
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item to [[Swapping|Swap]] this with.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

BlackHole.name: Black Hole
BlackHole.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Breaking|Break]] all items that are exactly 1 space away from this, then increase the range by 1.

Blackjack.name: Blackjack Hand
Blackjack.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If 21 other items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]]. If more than 21 other items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Blind.name: Shades
Blind.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Winning|Win]]. If this is [[Revealing|Revealed]], it can't be [[Equipping|Equipped]].

Bobblehead.name: Bobblehead
Bobblehead.description: You can only [[Using|Use]] items 4 times.

Bomb.name: Bomb
Bomb.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Breaking|Break]] this and nearby items.

Book.name: Book
Book.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If at least 15 other items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]]!

Booster.name: Booster Pack
Booster.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Unequipping|Unequip]] this and [[Morphing|Morph]] it into a random a Rare or rarer item.

Boots.name: Boots
Boots.description:
Whenever a [[Revealing|Hidden]] item [[Breaking|Breaks]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] it.
[[Using|Use]]: Choose a [[Breaking|Broken]] item to [[Fixing|Fix]].
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Bow.name: Bow
Bow.description: [[Using|Use]]: Choose a [[Revealing|Revealed]] non-{{B|Bow}} item. [[Breaking|Break]] this. The next time you're offered a Gift, that item will be the first option.

BoxJellyfish.name: Jellyfish
BoxJellyfish.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If 2 or more nearby items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Boxton.name: Squeeton
Boxton.description:
[[Revealing|Reveals]] itself.
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 3 random nearby items.

Bracelet.name: Bracelet
Bracelet.description: When each [[Equipping|Equipped]] item is near exactly 2 other [[Equipping|Equipped]] items, [[Winning|Win]].

Brilliant.name: To-do List
Brilliant.description: After [[Equipping|Equipping]] 3 Rare or rarer items, [[Winning|Win]].

Bubblegum.name: Bubblegum
Bubblegum.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random nearby item.
{{B|Mimic|Mimics}} cause you to [[Winning|Win]] instead of [[Losing|Lose]].

Bullseye.name: Bullseye
Bullseye.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If no nearby items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] nearby items.

Caterpillar.name: Caterpillar
Caterpillar.description: If this [[Morphing|Morphs]] while [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Butterfly.name: Butterfly
Butterfly.description: If this [[Morphing|Morphs]] while [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Button.name: Button
Button.description: [[Using|Use]]: 95% chance to [[Morphing|Morph]] a random nearby item and [[Revealing|Reveal]] it. Otherwise, [[Losing|Lose]].

Cage.name: Bottle
Cage.description:
[[Using|Use]]: [[Unequipping|Unequip]] this and [[Morphing|Morph]] this into {{B|Empty}}.
After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, put a random item in this Bottle.

Cage2.name: Cage
Cage2.description: You can only [[Equipping|Equip]] items within 2 spaces of this.

Cake.name: Cake
Cake.description: When each item in the bottom row is [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Cane.name: Cane
Cane.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item in the top or bottom 2 rows, 15% chance to [[Losing|Lose]].

Cannon.name: Cannon
Cannon.description:
Aims towards items you [[Equipping|Equip]].
[[Using|Use]]: [[Breaking|Break]] the item this is aiming at.

Capsule.name: Printer
Capsule.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose a [[Revealing|Revealed]] item.
[[Morphing|Morph]] 5 random other items into it.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Careful.name: Warning
Careful.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If 3 items that can make you [[Losing|Lose]] are [[Revealing|Revealed]], [[Winning|Win]].

Cascade.name: Dandelion
Cascade.description: When all items near this are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Breaking|Break]] this and [[Revealing|Reveal]] all items near them.

Cataclysmic.name: Meteor
Cataclysmic.description: After 15 [[Revealing|Hidden]] items are [[Revealing|Revealed]], [[Equipping|Equipped]], or [[Breaking|Broken]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Catalog.name: Catalogue
Catalog.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] the items to the left and right. After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, if they're not [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Morphing|Morph]] them.

Cell.name: Cell
Cell.description: The next time you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Morphing|Morph]] the items left and right of it into it.

Chain.name: Chain
Chain.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Modifier|Lock]] 1 random [[Revealing|Revealed]] [[Unequipping|Unequipped]] item.

Chalk.name: Chalk
Chalk.description: If this item is [[Morphing|Morphed]], [[Unequipping|Unequipped]], or [[Breaking|Broken]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Challenge.name: Demon
Challenge.description:
[[Immutable|Immutable]].
You can't [[Winning|Win]] until this is defeated.
[[Winning|Win]] 3 times to defeat.

Charon.name: Charon
Charon.description: Every 3 [[Equipping|Equips]], [[Swapping|Swaps]] with the item to its right. If it can't, [[Losing|Lose]].

Checkbox.name: Candle
Checkbox.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] a [[Revealing|Hidden]] item, [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item.

Cherry.name: Cherry
Cherry.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Morphing|Morph]] the item to its right into it.

Cigarettes.name: Cigarettes
Cigarettes.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 2 random items, then [[Morphing|Morph]] 1 random item in the next round into a {{B|Skull}}.

City.name: City
City.description: The next 5 times you [[Equipping|Equip]] a nearby item, [[Unequipping|Unequip]] the item on the other side of this.

Clipboard.name: Clipboard
Clipboard.description: When 3 of the same type of item are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Cloak.name: Cloak
Cloak.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If a {{B|Wand}} and {{B|Hat}} are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Wand.name: Wand
Wand.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If a {{B|Cloak}} and {{B|Hat}} are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Hat.name: Hat
Hat.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If a {{B|Cloak}} and {{B|Wand}} are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

CrystalBall.name: Crystal Ball
CrystalBall.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Revealing|Reveal]] {{B|Cloak|Cloaks}}, {{B|Wand|Wands}}, and {{B|Hat|Hats}} near it.

Clock.name: Clock
Clock.description:
[[Immutable|Immutable]].
When you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, starts [[Losing|ticking]].

Clone.name: Capsule
Clone.description:
[[Using|Use]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] a random nearby item.
[[Unequipping|Unequip]] this and [[Morphing|Morph]] this into it.

CloseSpender.name: Vending Machine
CloseSpender.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose a non-[[Gold|Gold]] item.
Spend [[Gold|2 Gold]] to [[Unequipping|Unequip]] it.

Clumsy.name: Mouse
Clumsy.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Equipping|Equip]] the item to the left.

Coffee.name: Coffee
Coffee.description: The next 2 times you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, immediately [[Unequipping|Unequip]] it.

Completionist.name: Mountain
Completionist.description: When 4 full rows of items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Conveyor.name: Conveyor
Conveyor.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Swapping|Shift]] this row to the left.

Copycat.name: Copycat
Copycat.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item.
[[Unequipping|Unequip]] this and [[Morphing|Morph]] this into it.

Costly.name: Price Tag
Costly.description:
Holds [[Gold|3 Gold]].
[[Equipping|Equipping]] [[Revealing|Revealed]] items costs [[Gold|1 Gold]].

Costume.name: Fedora
Costume.description: '''Before''' you [[Equipping|Equip]] a [[Revealing|Revealed]] item, 5% chance to [[Morphing|Morph]] it.

Couch.name: Couch
Couch.description:
[[Immutable|Immutable]].
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an [[Equipping|Equipped]] item.
[[Unequipping|Unequip]] it, then [[Equipping|Equip]] it.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

CreditCard.name: Credit Card
CreditCard.description:
[[Immutable|Immutable]].
Holds [[Gold|15 Gold]].
You must spend 1 [[Gold|Gold]] to [[Equipping|Equip]] items. If you run out of [[Gold|Gold]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Crossbow.name: Crossbow
Crossbow.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose a nearby item. [[Breaking|Break]] all items in that direction.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: [[Using|Use]]: Spend [[Gold|5 Gold]] to [[Winning|Win]].

Crumbling.name: Crumbling Castle
Crumbling.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Breaking|Break]] the top item (left to right).

CryoChamber.name: Chamber
CryoChamber.description:
[[Immutable|Immutable]].
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item to [[Modifier|Freeze]].
Start the next round with a copy of it.

Cuffs.name: Handcuffs
Cuffs.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Modifier|Lock]] 2 random [[Unequipping|Unequipped]] items.

Cursed.name: Curse
Cursed.description: If you would [[Winning|Win]], this [[Breaking|Breaks]] instead.

CursedBlade.name: Doomed Blade
CursedBlade.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] all [[Revealing|Hidden]] items into {{B|Skull|Skulls}}.

Daisy.name: Daisy
Daisy.description:
After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 20% chance to give it [[Modifier|Fragile]].
Every 6 [[Equipping|Equips]], [[Breaking|Break]] all [[Modifier|Fragile]] items.

Dancepad.name: Dancepad
Dancepad.description: Points a direction each time you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item. After [[Equipping|Equipping]] 6 items this points at consecutively, [[Winning|Win]].

Darts.name: Dartboard
Darts.description: When the total counters on [[Equipping|Equipped]] non-{{B|Darts}} items adds to 14 or more, [[Winning|Win]].

Delivery.name: Package
Delivery.description: [[Using|Use]]: Choose a [[Revealing|Revealed]] item. [[Breaking|Break]] it and this. Next round, [[Morphing|Morph]] the top item into it.

Demolition.name: Wrecking Ball
Demolition.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item to [[Breaking|Break]].
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

DemolitionTri.name: Wrecking Triangle
DemolitionTri.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose 3 [[Equipping|Equipped]] items in a triangle shape to [[Breaking|Break]].
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Desert.name: Sand
Desert.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If at least 9 items are [[Breaking|Broken]], [[Winning|Win]]!

Dice.name: Die
Dice.description:
[[Using|Use]]: [[Unequipping|Unequip]] and [[Morphing|Morph]] nearby [[Equipping|Equipped]] items.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Disappointed.name: Disappointment
Disappointed.description: When a [[Revealing|Revealed]] item that can make you [[Winning|Win]] is [[Breaking|Broken]], [[Winning|Win]].

DNA.name: DNA
DNA.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] all nearby items into the same random item.

Dragon.name: Dragon
Dragon.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 10 random other items into {{B|Skull|Skulls}}. Then, after [[Equipping|Equipping]] 5 more items, [[Winning|Win]].

Princess.name: Princess
Princess.description:
Holds [[Gold|3 Gold]].
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If a {{B|Dragon}} is [[Revealing|Revealed]], [[Losing|Lose]].

DraughtsPiece.name: King
DraughtsPiece.description:
[[Swapping|Jumps]] over items you [[Equipping|Equip]] nearby.
[[Revealing|Reveals]] items it [[Swapping|Swaps]] with.

Dungeon.name: Dungeon
Dungeon.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] a random item in each row into a {{B|Spike}}.

Spike.name: Spike
Spike.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If 3 or more {{B|Spike|Spikes}} are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Eclipse.name: Time Machine
Eclipse.description: After 3 [[Equipping|Equips]], this [[Breaking|Breaks]] to [[Unequipping|Unequip]] all non-Gift items.

Egg.name: Egg
Egg.description: If this item is [[Breaking|Broken]] while [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Elephant.name: Elephant
Elephant.description:
You can't [[Equipping|Equip]] items anywhere above this.
After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item anywhere below this, [[Swapping|Swaps]] with it.

Ephemeral.name: Petal
Ephemeral.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 5% chance to [[Revealing|Hide]] and [[Morphing|Morph]] all [[Unequipping|Unequipped]] [[Revealing|Revealed]] items.

Espionage.name: Folder
Espionage.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If at least 20 other items are [[Revealing|Revealed]], [[Winning|Win]]!

ExtraLife.name: Mushroom
ExtraLife.description: If you would [[Losing|Lose]], this [[Breaking|Breaks]] instead.

EyeDropper.name: Eye Dropper
EyeDropper.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item.
[[Morphing|Morph]] items near it into it.
Can be [[Using|Used]] 2 times.

Factory.name: Factory
Factory.description: Whenever an item [[Morphing|Morphs]], 25% chance to [[Breaking|Break]] and [[Revealing|Reveal]] it.

Fairy.name: Fairy
Fairy.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If 4 {{B|Fairy|Fairies}} are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]]. Otherwise, [[Morphing|Morph]] 1 random [[Unequipping|Unequipped]] item into a {{B|Fairy}}.

Figurine.name: Figurine
Figurine.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose 2 [[Revealing|Revealed]] items.
[[Morphing|Morph]] one into the other at random.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Filmer.name: Cine-camera
Filmer.description:
[[Round|Round Start]]: [[Swapping|Moves]] all the way left.
[[Using|Use]]: [[Unequipping|Unequip]] the item right of this, then [[Swapping|Swap]] with it.
Can be [[Using|Used]] 5 times.

Fire.name: Flame
Fire.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] a random nearby item into a {{B|Fire}} and [[Revealing|Reveal]] it.

Match.name: Match
Match.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 2 random other items into {{B|Fire|Flames}}.

Firework.name: Firework
Firework.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 3 random items into {{B|SmartBomb|Smart Bombs}}.

FirstAid.name: Tape
FirstAid.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose a [[Breaking|Broken]] item to [[Fixing|Fix]].
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Flagseeker.name: Flagseeker
Flagseeker.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Revealing|Reveal]] nearby {{B|Flag|Flags}}.

Flashlight.name: Flashlight
Flashlight.description: The next time you [[Equipping|Equip]] a nearby item, [[Revealing|Reveal]] all items in that direction.

Flipflop.name: Snow Globe
Flipflop.description: Whenever a [[Revealing|Hidden]] item [[Breaking|Breaks]], [[Fixing|Fix]] and [[Revealing|Reveal]] it.

Forest.name: Tree (OLD)
Forest.description:
[[Using|Use]]: [[Unequipping|Unequip]] 1 random other item.
Can be [[Using|Used]] 3 times.

Forest2.name: Forest
Forest2.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] a [[Revealing|Hidden]] item, immediately [[Unequipping|Unequip]] it.

Forgetful.name: Forgetfulness
Forgetful.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 2 random [[Revealing|Revealed]] [[Unequipping|Unequipped]] items.

Fossil.name: Fossil
Fossil.description:
After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 5% chance to [[Losing|Lose]].
On [[Revealing|Reveal]]: [[Equipping|Equips]] itself.

Fox.name: Fox
Fox.description: [[Using|Use]]: 15% chance to [[Winning|Win]]. Otherwise, this [[Breaking|Breaks]].

Fraidy.name: Fog
Fraidy.description: For the next 5 [[Equipping|Equips]], you must [[Equipping|Equip]] [[Revealing|Revealed]] items first.

Framed.name: Frame
Framed.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item.
Future {{B|Framed|Frames}} will contain it.
[[Morphing|Morph]] it into {{B|Eye}} and [[Breaking|Break]] this.

Fridge.name: Fridge
Fridge.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] all nearby items. For the next 3 [[Equipping|Equips]], you can't [[Equipping|Equip]] them.

Friendly.name: Cuddle Cat
Friendly.description: You must [[Equipping|Equip]] items near this first.

FutureWin.name: Holo-Flag
FutureWin.description: On [[Winning|Win]]: [[Winning|Win]] the next round, too.

Gamer.name: Controller
Gamer.description:
[[Using|Use]] 1: [[Breaking|Break]] items directly above this.
[[Using|Use]] 2: [[Unequipping|Unequip]] the item left of this.
[[Using|Use]] 3: [[Morphing|Morph]] the item right of this.
[[Using|Use]] 4: [[Unequipping|Unequip]], [[Revealing|Hide]], and [[Morphing|Morph]] this.

Gavel.name: Gavel
Gavel.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If all [[Revealing|Revealed]] items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Gear.name: Gear
Gear.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an [[Equipping|Equipped]] item.
[[Unequipping|Unequip]], [[Revealing|Hide]], and [[Morphing|Morph]] it.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Geode.name: Geode
Geode.description: [[Using|Use]]: Spend [[Gold|3 Gold]] to [[Morphing|Morph]] this into a random mineral.

Pyrite.name: Pyrite
Pyrite.description:
[[Using|Use]]: 5% chance to [[Revealing|Reveal]] 5 random items,
20% chance to [[Breaking|Break]],
otherwise, gains 2 [[Gold|Gold]].

RoseQuartz.name: Rose Quartz
RoseQuartz.description: [[Using|Use]]: 85% chance to [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item. Otherwise, [[Breaking|Breaks]].

Amethyst.name: Amethyst
Amethyst.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose a [[Revealing|Revealed]] item.
[[Morphing|Morph]] 3 random other items into it.
Can't choose the same type of item twice.

Carnelian.name: Carnelian
Carnelian.description: [[Using|Use]]: Spend [[Gold|1 Gold]] to [[Fixing|Fix]] all [[Breaking|Broken]] items.

Ametrine.name: Ametrine
Ametrine.description: If this item is [[Breaking|Broken]] while [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] 8 random items.

Jasper.name: Jasper
Jasper.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item to [[Unequipping|Unequip]].
Can't choose the same item twice.

Ghost.name: Ghost
Ghost.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 2 random items into {{B|Skull|Skulls}}.

Jolly.name: Jolly Hat
Jolly.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Unequipping|Unequip]] all Presents. When you [[Equipping|Equip]] a Present, [[Unequipping|Unequip]] it and [[Breaking|Break]] this.

Glip.name: glip
Glip.description: after you [[Equipping|equip]] an item, this [[Swapping|swaps]] with a random item near this and [[Revealing|reveals]] it.

Glitched.name: Glitch
Glitched.description: Whenever items [[Morphing|Morph]], they [[Morphing|Morph]] into {{B|Glitched|Glitches}}. On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If 2 {{B|Glitched|Glitches}} are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Gloves.name: Gloves
Gloves.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item to [[Morphing|Morph]] and [[Revealing|Reveal]].
[[Using|Uses]] past the first [[Morphing|Morph]] the same item again.
Can be [[Using|Used]] 5 times.

Gnat.name: Gnat
Gnat.description: '''Before''' you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 5% chance to [[Morphing|Morph]] it into a {{B|Gnat}}.

Goggles.name: Goggles
Goggles.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 4 random items. Then, prevent the next 3 times you would [[Revealing|Reveal]] an item.

GrapplingHook.name: Grappling Hook
GrapplingHook.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] the leftmost item in a row, [[Revealing|Reveal]] the rightmost item in that row.

Gravity.name: Gravity
Gravity.description: You can only [[Equipping|Equip]] items in the bottom row or directly above another [[Equipping|Equipped]] item.

Hacker.name: Moon
Hacker.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 20% chance to immediately [[Unequipping|Unequip]] it.

Halo.name: Screwdriver
Halo.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Fixing|Fix]] 5 random [[Breaking|Broken]] items.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.description: Whenever an item [[Breaking|Breaks]], 50% chance to immediately [[Fixing|Fix]] it.

Hand.name: Hand
Hand.description: Whenever [[Equipping|Equipped]] items [[Morphing|Morph]], [[Unequipping|Unequip]] them.

Heart.name: Helmet
Heart.description: For the next 5 [[Equipping|Equips]], you can't [[Losing|Lose]].

Heartbreak.name: Balloon
Heartbreak.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 0% chance to [[Losing|Lose]]. Otherwise, increase this chance by 2%.

HorizontalSight.name: Window
HorizontalSight.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] all items in this row.

Horse.name: Horse
Horse.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] and [[Modifier|Roughen]] 3 random items.
[[Modifier|Rough]] - Can only be [[Equipping|Equipped]] if 2 nearby items are [[Equipping|Equipped]].

Hourglass.name: Hourglass
Hourglass.description: If you would [[Losing|Lose]] while this isn't counting down, prevent the [[Losing|Loss]] and [[Losing|Lose]] in 3 [[Equipping|Equips]].

Hungry.name: Vacuum
Hungry.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] all items in a random row into {{B|Empty}}.

Ice.name: Snowflake
Ice.description: You can't [[Equipping|Equip]] items near this.

Impatient.name: Impatience
Impatient.description: Whenever you [[Revealing|Reveal]] an item in this row, [[Equipping|Equip]] it.

Impossi.name: Stained Glass
Impossi.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 5% chance to [[Winning|Win]].

Inescapable.name: The Inescapable
Inescapable.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Losing|Lose]].
On [[Revealing|Reveal]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 2 random [[Revealing|Hidden]] items into {{B|Inescapable}}.

Info.name: Newspaper
Info.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 2 random nearby items.

Inky.name: Ink
Inky.description: The next time an item would be [[Revealing|Revealed]], this [[Breaking|Breaks]] instead.

InstaOpener.name: Crab
InstaOpener.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Equipping|Equip]] the items to the left and right of this.

Ivy.name: Ivy
Ivy.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] a random item directly above this into {{B|Ivy}}.

JackInThe.name: Sticky Hand
JackInThe.description: Every 2 [[Equipping|Equips]], [[Unequipping|Unequip]] 1 random other item.

JellyGBox.name: Jelly G.
JellyGBox.description: [[Using|Use]]: 70% chance to [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item. Otherwise, [[Breaking|Breaks]].

JumpRope.name: Jump Rope
JumpRope.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item, then [[Morphing|Morph]] 2 random items into {{B|JumpRope|Jump Ropes}}.

Jumpscare.name: Bear
Jumpscare.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If no other items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Key.name: Plug
Key.description: If the next item you [[Equipping|Equip]] is a {{B|Lock}}, [[Winning|Win]].

Ladder.name: Ladder
Ladder.description: When there is exactly 1 [[Equipping|Equipped]] item in each row, [[Winning|Win]].

Lamp.name: Lamp
Lamp.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item with a percentage chance. Give it [[Modifier|Lucky]] - Twice as likely to trigger.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

LandMine.name: Mine
LandMine.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Breaking|Break]] nearby items.
If [[Breaking|Broken]], [[Revealing|Reveals]] itself.

Locust.name: Termite
Locust.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Breaking|Break]] the leftmost item in each row.

Logical.name: Clue
Logical.description: Whenever an item is [[Breaking|Broken]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] it.

Lonely.name: Loneliness
Lonely.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If this is near a [[Breaking|Broken]] item, [[Losing|Lose]].

Loser.name: L
Loser.description: When an entire row of items is [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Lucky.name: Clover
Lucky.description: Double all percentage chances on items.

Lunar.name: Tree
Lunar.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Breaking|Break]] this to [[Unequipping|Unequip]] 5 random items.

Treasure.name: Treasure
Treasure.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If there is an unbroken path of [[Equipping|Equipped]] items to a {{B|Map}}, [[Winning|Win]].

Mask.name: Mask
Mask.description: Every 3 [[Equipping|Equips]], [[Breaking|Break]] 1 random [[Equipping|Equipped]] item.

MasterKey.name: Key
MasterKey.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] and [[Modifier|Lock]] all items that are 2 spaces away.
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item.
Spend [[Gold|1 Gold]] to [[Modifier|Unlock]] it.

Microphone.name: Microphone
Microphone.description: When 10 other items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Breaking|Break]] this and [[Revealing|Reveal]] 3 random items.

Microscope.name: Sword
Microscope.description: When you try to [[Equipping|Equip]] a [[Revealing|Hidden]] item, 15% chance to [[Revealing|Reveal]] it instead.

Mimic.name: Mimic
Mimic.description:
Appears to be another item from the pyramid until [[Equipping|Equipped]].
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Losing|Lose]].

Mine.name: Pickaxe
Mine.description: After [[Equipping|Equipping]] a nearby item, this gains [[Gold|1 Gold]].

Mirror.name: Mirror (OLD)
Mirror.description: When this is [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Morphing|Morphed]], [[Unequipping|Unequipped]], or [[Breaking|Broken]], do the same to all nearby items.

Mirror2.name: Mirror
Mirror2.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item.
Spend [[Gold|1 Gold]] to [[Unequipping|Unequip]] this and [[Morphing|Morph]] this into it.

Monopoly.name: Top Hat
Monopoly.description: Holds [[Gold|2 Gold]]. [[Using|Use]]: 50% chance to double this item's [[Gold|Gold]]. Otherwise, [[Breaking|Breaks]].

Monster.name: Devourer
Monster.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Breaking|Breaks]] a random nearby item and [[Swapping|Swaps]] with it.

Mud.name: Mud
Mud.description: Whenever you [[Revealing|Reveal]] an item, 15% chance to [[Modifier|Lock]] it.

MusicNote.name: Music Note
MusicNote.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, if all [[Revealing|Revealed]] items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item.

Negative.name: Negativity
Negative.description: If you would [[Winning|Win]], 25% chance to prevent that [[Winning|Win]].

Nessie.name: Nessie
Nessie.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If another {{B|Nessie}} is [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Losing|Lose]]. Otherwise, [[Morphing|Morph]] 1 random [[Unequipping|Unequipped]] item into a {{B|Nessie}}.

Note.name: Note
Note.description: When 10 other items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Breaking|Break]] this and [[Modifier|Lock]] all [[Revealing|Revealed]] items.

Notepad.name: Notepad
Notepad.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] all nearby items. When you next [[Equipping|Equip]] one, [[Breaking|Break]] the others.

N2.name: Two
N2.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] a number, [[Revealing|Reveal]] its double.

N3.name: Three
N3.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 3 random odd numbers.

N6.name: Six
N6.description: If this is [[Breaking|Broken]] by {{B|N5}} while [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]]. If [[Breaking|Broken]] by anything else, [[Losing|Lose]].

N7.name: Seven
N7.description: Whenever you [[Equipping|Equip]] a multiple of 7, 7% chance to [[Winning|Win]].

N8.name: Eight
N8.description: [[Using|Use]]: Choose a number less than 8. [[Unequipping|Unequip]] it and [[Morphing|Square]] it.

N9.name: Nine
N9.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If exactly 9 other items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] 5 random items.
(9 items currently [[Equipping|Equipped]].)

N10.name: Ten
N10.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] a random multiple of 4.

N11.name: Eleven
N11.description: If you [[Equipping|Equip]] a multiple of 11, [[Winning|Win]].

N12.name: Twelve
N12.description: The next time you [[Equipping|Equip]] a number, [[Breaking|Break]] this. If it was less than this, [[Revealing|Reveal]] that many random items.

N13.name: Thirteen
N13.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] a number, % chance to [[Losing|Lose]] equal to it.

N14.name: Fourteen
N14.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an [[Equipping|Equipped]] number.
If it's a multiple of 4, [[Unequipping|Unequip]] it. Otherwise, [[Breaking|Break]] it and this.

N15.name: Fifteen
N15.description:
When 5 or more [[Equipping|Equipped]] numbers are 10 or less, [[Winning|Win]].
(15 currently [[Equipping|Equipped]].)

N16.name: Sixteen
N16.description: Whenever you [[Equipping|Equip]] a multiple of 6, [[Breaking|Break]] it.

N18.name: Eighteen
N18.description: Odd numbers cannot be [[Equipping|Equipped]]. If you try to [[Equipping|Equip]] one, [[Revealing|Reveal]] it instead.

N19.name: Nineteen
N19.description: If you would [[Equipping|Equip]] a perfect cube, [[Breaking|Break]] it and [[Revealing|Reveal]] items near it instead.

N20.name: Twenty
N20.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Breaking|Breaks]] random other [[Revealing|Revealed]] numbers until at least 100 is added to the [[Breaking|Break]] Total.

N21.name: Twenty One
N21.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Breaking|Break]] and [[Revealing|Reveal]] 2 random numbers. If the difference between them was 8 or less, [[Revealing|Reveal]] all numbers inbetween.

N22.name: Twenty Two
N22.description: If at any point, [[Equipping|Equip]] Total exceeds 500, [[Losing|Lose]].

N23.name: Twenty Three
N23.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Breaking|Break]] a random [[Equipping|Equipped]] number. If at any point [[Equipping|Equip]] Total is exactly 230, [[Winning|Win]].

N24.name: Twenty Four
N24.description: If you [[Equipping|Equip]] a perfect square, [[Losing|Lose]].

N25.name: Twenty Five
N25.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If {{B|N5}} is [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] 5 random items.

N26.name: Twenty Six
N26.description: [[Using|Use]]: Choose 2 numbers less than 26. [[Revealing|Reveal]] their sum and [[Breaking|Break]] this.

N27.name: Twenty Seven
N27.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Breaking|Break]] and [[Revealing|Reveal]] nearby prime numbers.

N29.name: Twenty Nine
N29.description:
When the [[Equipping|Equipped]] numbers in this row sum to 150 or more, [[Winning|Win]].
(Current total: 29)

N30.name: Thirty
N30.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] random numbers until at least 100 is added to [[Revealing|Reveal]] Total.

N31.name: Thirty One
N31.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Unequipping|Unequip]] all multiples of 10. If none were [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Equipping|Equip]] {{B|N10}} instead.

N32.name: Thirty Two
N32.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Fixing|Fix]] random [[Breaking|Broken]] numbers until [[Breaking|Break]] Total is 32 or less.

N33.name: Thirty Three
N33.description: Whenever you [[Equipping|Equip]] a prime number, [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random non-prime near it.

N35.name: Thirty Five
N35.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Unequipping|Unequip]] this and [[Morphing|Morph]] it into a random number between 1 and 10.

N36.name: Thirty Six
N36.description: When a run of 4 numbers is [[Equipping|Equipped]] (e.g. 3, 4, 5, 6), [[Winning|Win]].

N37.name: Thirty Seven
N37.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If {{B|N5}} is [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]]. Otherwise, [[Losing|Lose]].

N38.name: Thirty Eight
N38.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] all nearby numbers. If their total adds up to 150 or more, [[Losing|Lose]].

N40.name: Forty
N40.description: When a [[Revealing|Revealed]] multiple of 3 is near this, [[Breaking|Break]] it.

N41.name: Forty One
N41.description: Whenever you [[Equipping|Equip]] a multiple of 5, [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random number.

N42.name: Forty Two
N42.description: [[Using|Use]]: Choose a number. [[Breaking|Break]] it and this, then [[Revealing|Reveal]] a random number higher and a random number lower than it.

N43.name: Forty Three
N43.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] a random item. If it was an odd number, [[Breaking|Break]] this.

N44.name: Forty Four
N44.description: If you would [[Winning|Win]] and [[Equipping|Equip]] Total is above 300, [[Breaking|Break]] 5 random [[Equipping|Equipped]] numbers instead.

N45.name: Forty Five
N45.description: The next time you [[Equipping|Equip]] a number, [[Breaking|Break]] this. If it was greater than this, [[Winning|Win]].

N46.name: Forty Six
N46.description: [[Using|Use]]: Choose a number. [[Unequipping|Unequip]] this and [[Morphing|Morph]] this into it plus 1.

N47.name: Forty Seven
N47.description: [[Using|Use]]: Choose a number. [[Unequipping|Unequip]] this and [[Morphing|Morph]] this into it minus 1.

N48.name: Forty Eight
N48.description: Whenever you [[Equipping|Equip]] a number, [[Breaking|Break]] and [[Revealing|Reveal]] a random number less than it.

N49.name: Forty Nine
N49.description: Whenever you [[Equipping|Equip]] a number, [[Revealing|Reveal]] its successor.

N50.name: Fifty
N50.description: When [[Equipping|Equip]] Total is a multiple of 50, [[Winning|Win]].

OrbBlast.name: Basket
OrbBlast.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 1 random item in each direction from this into a {{B|Orb}}.

Orb.name: Fruit
Orb.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If '''all''' {{B|Orb}} are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Pandoras.name: Skeleton
Pandoras.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] all other [[Revealing|Revealed]] items into {{B|Skull|Skulls}}.

Patterned.name: Scissors
Patterned.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: For each nearby item, [[Morphing|Morph]] 1 random item into it.

PayForReveals.name: Telescope
PayForReveals.description: [[Using|Use]]: Spend [[Gold|1 Gold]] to [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item.

Petal.name: Petal (OLD)
Petal.description: The next 2 times a [[Revealing|Hidden]] item [[Morphing|Morphs]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] it.

Phone.name: Telephone
Phone.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Modifier|Connect]] 1 random [[Equipping|Equipped]] item.
Every 3 [[Equipping|Equips]], [[Unequipping|Unequip]] [[Modifier|Connected]] items.

PiggyBank.name: Piggy Bank
PiggyBank.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item that can spend [[Gold|Gold]], this gains 2 [[Gold|Gold]].

Pinwheel.name: Pinwheel
Pinwheel.description: If you would [[Winning|Win]], 50% chance for this to [[Breaking|Break]] instead.

Pit.name: Pit
Pit.description: For the next 10 [[Equipping|Equips]], you can't [[Winning|Win]].

PlayingCard.name: Ace
PlayingCard.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 2 items near each other. You must [[Equipping|Equip]] one of them next.

Antidote.name: Antidote
Antidote.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Breaking|Break]] all [[Revealing|Revealed]] {{B|Poison|Poisons}} and {{B|Viral|Viruses}}.

Police.name: Bubble
Police.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If at least 10 other items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Polterbox.name: Poltergeist
Polterbox.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item. [[Swapping|Swap]] it with a random item near this.
Can be [[Using|Used]] 3 times.

Portal.name: Portal
Portal.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose 2 items to [[Swapping|Swap]].
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Poster.name: Poster
Poster.description: While there are at least 5 [[Unequipping|Unequipped]] [[Revealing|Revealed]] items, you must [[Equipping|Equip]] [[Revealing|Revealed]] items first.

Pot.name: Pot
Pot.description: When you [[Unequipping|Unequip]] an item, 30% chance to [[Breaking|Break]] it.

Potion.name: Potion
Potion.description:
[[Immutable|Immutable]].
[[Using|Use]]: Give +1 [[Using|Use]] to all non-{{B|Potion}} [[Equipping|Equipped]] limited [[Using|Use]] items.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

PriceyRowRevealer.name: Wishing Well
PriceyRowRevealer.description: [[Using|Use]]: Spend [[Gold|3 Gold]] to [[Revealing|Reveal]] all items in a random row.

Programmed.name: Terminal
Programmed.description:
[[Immutable|Immutable]].
You can only [[Equipping|Equip]] items in the highest row with no [[Equipping|Equipped]] items.

Puppet.name: Puppet
Puppet.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 4 random nearby items.
After [[Equipping|Equipping]] 10 items, [[Losing|Lose]].

Puzzle.name: Vexbox
Puzzle.description:
When there are 30 [[Breaking|Broken]] items, [[Winning|Win]].
[[Using|Use]]: [[Breaking|Break]] 6 random items.

PuzzlePiece.name: Puzzle Piece
PuzzlePiece.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 1 random item into a {{B|PuzzlePiece}}.
When this is near another [[Equipping|Equipped]] {{B|PuzzlePiece}}, [[Winning|Win]].

Queen.name: Queen
Queen.description:
After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item in any direction, [[Swapping|Swaps]] with it.
After doing this 3 times, [[Losing|Lose]].

Radar.name: Radar
Radar.description: Every 3 [[Equipping|Equips]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] the nearest [[Revealing|Hidden]] item.

Remote.name: Remote
Remote.description: The next time you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Breaking|Break]] items near it.

Reset.name: Bin
Reset.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Unequipping|Unequip]], [[Revealing|Hide]], and [[Morphing|Morph]] [[Equipping|Equipped]] items within 2 spaces.

ReverseArmageddon.name: Lemon
ReverseArmageddon.description: After [[Equipping|Equipping]] 3 items, [[Breaking|Break]] this and the outer rim of items.

Revolver.name: Revolver
Revolver.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item.
Spend [[Gold|1 Gold]] to [[Breaking|Break]] it.

Ritual.name: Scroll
Ritual.description:
After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, gains a charge.
[[Using|Use]]: [[Breaking|Break]] this to [[Revealing|Reveal]] random items equal to its charges.

Rocket.name: Rocket
Rocket.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Breaking|Break]] 3 random other [[Revealing|Revealed]] items.

Rogue.name: Hero
Rogue.description:
[[Immutable|Immutable]].
You can only [[Equipping|Equip]] items near this.
After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, this [[Swapping|Swaps]] with it.

RowBomb.name: Uranium
RowBomb.description: If you [[Equipping|Equip]] another item in the same row as this, [[Breaking|Break]] all items in this row.

RowGold.name: Rowgold
RowGold.description: Holds [[Gold|1 Gold]] for each other [[Equipping|Equipped]] item in this row.

RowSweeper.name: Row-Sweeper
RowSweeper.description: Displays the number of items in this row that can make you [[Losing|Lose]].

Rowwin.name: Pancake
Rowwin.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If all items in this row are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

RowWinseeker.name: Row-Winseeker
RowWinseeker.description: Displays the number of items in this row that can make you [[Winning|Win]].

Rubble.name: Rubble
Rubble.description: When 15 or more items are [[Breaking|Broken]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Sacrificial.name: Staff
Sacrificial.description:
[[Using|Use]]: [[Breaking|Break]] 1 random item, then [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item.
Can be [[Using|Used]] 4 times.

Safeguard.name: Camera
Safeguard.description: The next 2 times you try to [[Equipping|Equip]] a [[Revealing|Hidden]] item, [[Revealing|Reveal]] it instead.

Sandbox.name: Sandbox
Sandbox.description: After [[Equipping|Equipping]] 5 items, [[Breaking|Break]] this and [[Morphing|Morph]] 2 random items into {{B|Inescapable}}.

Satellite.name: Satellite
Satellite.description: Whenever you [[Revealing|Reveal]] an item, 10% chance to [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 additional random item.

School.name: Ocean
School.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 3 random [[Revealing|Hidden]] items into {{B|Fish}}.

Fish.name: Fish
Fish.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If 3 or more {{B|Fish}} are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Scrap.name: Screw
Scrap.description: Whenever another item is [[Breaking|Broken]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item.

Script.name: Script
Script.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 1 random [[Revealing|Hidden]] item into a {{B|Flag}}.

Searchlight.name: Spotlight
Searchlight.description: The next time you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Revealing|Reveal]] items near it.

SeeingStone.name: Seeing Stone
SeeingStone.description:
[[Using|Use]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item.
25 [[Using|Uses]] left.
Does not regain [[Using|Uses]] between rounds.
Regains uses when picked as a Gift.

SelfDestruct.name: Self-Destructor
SelfDestruct.description: After opening another item, this explodes, [[Breaking|Breaking]] itself.

Sentinel.name: Eye
Sentinel.description:
Looks towards items you [[Equipping|Equip]].
You can't [[Equipping|Equip]] items this sees.

Seven.name: Pin
Seven.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If exactly 10 other items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: If you would [[Losing|Lose]], 50% chance for this to [[Breaking|Break]] instead.

Shoeprint.name: Shoeprint
Shoeprint.description: On [[Winning|Win]]: Keep 2 random [[Equipping|Equipped]] items.

Shy.name: Armadillo
Shy.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 33% chance to [[Unequipping|Unequip]] this item.

SilverShip.name: Another World
SilverShip.description: If you would [[Winning|Win]], [[Breaking|Break]] this and [[Morphing|Morph]] all [[Revealing|Revealed]] items instead.

Sleepy.name: Sleepyhead
Sleepy.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] and [[Breaking|Break]] all {{B|Flag|Flags}} and {{B|Skull|Skulls}}.

Slime.name: Slime
Slime.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Breaking|Break]] this and [[Morphing|Morph]] 2 random nearby items into {{B|Slime|Slimes}} and [[Revealing|Reveal]] them.

Slots.name: Slot Machine
Slots.description: [[Using|Use]]: Spend [[Gold|1 Gold]] for a 15% chance to [[Winning|Win]].

SmartBomb.name: Smart Bomb
SmartBomb.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] all nearby items.
After [[Equipping|Equipping]] 2 items, [[Breaking|Break]] this and nearby items.

Smile.name: Smile
Smile.description:
You can't [[Winning|Win]] until this is defeated.
[[Winning|Win]] 5 times to defeat.
On [[Winning|Win]]: Erase this Burden.

Snail.name: Snail
Snail.description:
When you try to [[Equipping|Equip]] a [[Revealing|Hidden]] item, [[Revealing|Reveal]] it instead.
Every 2 times this happens, [[Equipping|Equip]] the top leftmost [[Revealing|Revealed]] item.

Sniper.name: Acid
Sniper.description: Whenever another item would be [[Unequipping|Unequipped]], [[Breaking|Break]] it instead.

Soap.name: Soap
Soap.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item to [[Morphing|Morph]] into {{B|Empty}}.
Can be [[Using|Used]] 3 times.

Sparkle.name: Sparkle
Sparkle.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Modifier|Shine]] 2 random [[Unequipping|Unequipped]] items.

Speedrun.name: Speedrunner
Speedrun.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If no other items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Spellbook.name: Spellbook
Spellbook.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose a [[Revealing|Revealed]] non-Gift item to give [[Modifier|Magic]] - '''Before''' you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 15% chance to [[Morphing|Morph]] it into this.
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Sponge.name: Spongebox
Sponge.description:
On [[Revealing|Reveal]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] 2 random nearby items.
''([[Equipping|Equipping]] an item counts as [[Revealing|Revealing]] it.)''

Spreadsheet.name: Spreadsheet
Spreadsheet.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] a random item that can [[Winning|Win]].

Spring.name: Spring
Spring.description:
[[Using|Use]]: [[Swapping|Swap]] the {{B|Rogue}} with a random item.
Can be [[Using|Used]] 3 times.

Spy.name: Mirage
Spy.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] all nearby items.
If this is [[Revealing|Revealed]], it can't be [[Equipping|Equipped]].

Stall.name: Stall
Stall.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item.
Spend [[Gold|2 Gold]]. If it was [[Revealing|Revealed]], [[Morphing|Morph]] it.
Otherwise, [[Revealing|Reveal]] it.

Star.name: Star
Star.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If all nearby items are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]]!

Study.name: Pencil
Study.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 33% chance to [[Revealing|Reveal]] a random item.

Suit.name: Suit
Suit.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Modifier|Shine]] 3 random [[Unequipping|Unequipped]] items.
After you [[Equipping|Equip]] a [[Modifier|Modified]] item, 10% chance to [[Winning|Win]].

Sunflower.name: Sunflower
Sunflower.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] and [[Modifier|Lock]] 2 items that can [[Winning|Win]].

Sus.name: Imboxtor
Sus.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] a random [[Revealing|Hidden]] item into a {{B|Mimic}} of another, then [[Revealing|Reveal]] them.

Sweeper.name: Sweeper (OLD)
Sweeper.description: Displays the number of nearby items that can make you [[Losing|Lose]].

Sweeper2.name: Sweeper
Sweeper2.description:
Counts nearby [[Revealing|Hidden]] Skulls.
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item to [[Revealing|Reveal]].
If it wasn't a {{B|Skull}}, [[Losing|Lose]].

Sword.name: Sword (OLD)
Sword.description:
When you try to [[Equipping|Equip]] a [color=#914d69]Monster[/color], [[Revealing|Reveal]] it instead.
If you would [[Losing|Lose]] to a [color=#914d69]Monster[/color], [[Winning|Win]] instead.

Tape.name: Bag
Tape.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose an item to [[Unequipping|Unequip]].
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Television.name: Television
Television.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Breaking|Break]] 2 random [[Revealing|Revealed]] items to [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item.

Temporal.name: Time Machine (OLD)
Temporal.description:
[[Using|Use]]: rewind time to when this first became [[Equipping|Equipped]], then [[Breaking|Break]] this.
''You keep what items were [[Revealing|Revealed]].''

Territory.name: Glue
Territory.description: You can only [[Equipping|Equip]] items near [[Equipping|Equipped]] items.

Tetris.name: Block
Tetris.description: After [[Equipping|Equipping]] the last [[Unequipping|Unequipped]] item in a row, [[Revealing|Reveal]] 2 random items in the row below it.

Thesis.name: Thesis
Thesis.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 12 random [[Revealing|Hidden]] items into {{B|Empty}}.

Three.name: Ticket
Three.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If you've [[Equipping|Equipped]] a {{B|Three}} 3 or more times this game, [[Winning|Win]].

Tinfoil.name: Tinfoil
Tinfoil.description: You can always [[Equipping|Equip]] all items.

Toolbox.name: Multi-tool
Toolbox.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] the items above this into a Bag and a Wrecking Ball.

Top.name: Top
Top.description:
[[Using|Use]]: 2% chance to [[Losing|Lose]].
Otherwise, [[Revealing|Reveal]] 1 random item and double the chance to lose.

Trading.name: Roulette
Trading.description: [[Using|Use]]: [[Unequipping|Unequip]] a random other item, then [[Equipping|Equip]] a random item.

TrainingDummy.name: Training Dummy
TrainingDummy.description: Prevent the next 5 times you would [[Revealing|Reveal]] an item.

Trampoline.name: Trampoline
Trampoline.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item within 2 spaces of this, immediately [[Unequipping|Unequip]] it.

Transmog.name: Test Tube
Transmog.description:
[[Using|Use]]: Choose a [[Revealing|Revealed]] item to [[Morphing|Morph]].
Can be [[Using|Used]] once.

Trapdoor.name: Trap
Trapdoor.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: 25% chance to [[Losing|Lose]].
After [[Equipping|Equipping]] a nearby item, if this is [[Revealing|Revealed]], [[Equipping|Equips]] itself.

Trigaze.name: Triangle
Trigaze.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] the corner items.

Turret.name: Turret
Turret.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Breaking|Break]] the item this is pointing at, then rotates clockwise.

Twister.name: Twister
Twister.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Round|Round Start]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] the top item.
When you [[Equipping|Equip]] it, [[Revealing|Reveal]] the second row.

Two.name: Sculpture
Two.description: When 2 [[Revealing|Revealed]] items near this are the same, [[Winning|Win]].

Tyre.name: Tyre
Tyre.description: If you [[Winning|Win]] in the first 10 [[Equipping|Equips]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] 3 random items in the next round.

UFB.name: UFO
UFB.description:
After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item directly above this, [[Swapping|Swaps]] with it.
When this is at the top, [[Winning|Win]].

Umbrella.name: Umbrella
Umbrella.description:
After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 20% chance to give it [[Modifier|Muddy]].
[[Using|Use]]: Choose a [[Modifier|Muddy]] item to [[Morphing|Morph]].

Underrated.name: Underratedness
Underrated.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Revealing|Reveal]] the [[Revealing|Hidden]] item you've [[Equipping|Equipped]] the least.

Underworld.name: Underworld
Underworld.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Losing|Lose]].
Then, if you didn't [[Losing|Lose]], [[Winning|Win]].

Unrevealed.name: Box
Unrevealed.description:
Contains a [[Revealing|Hidden]] item.
Click to [[Equipping|Equip]] it!

Unstable.name: Sun
Unstable.description: When you try to [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, 25% chance to [[Breaking|Break]] and [[Revealing|Reveal]] it instead.

Vampire.name: Vampire
Vampire.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Breaking|Breaks]] 2 random other [[Revealing|Revealed]] items. If it can't, [[Losing|Lose]].

Violin.name: Violin
Violin.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] a [[Revealing|Revealed]] item, 15% chance to [[Losing|Lose]].

Viral.name: Virus
Viral.description: After you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, [[Morphing|Morph]] a random item near this into {{B|Decayed}}, [[Equipping|Equip]] it, and [[Swapping|Swap]] with it.

Decayed.name: Decay
Decayed.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]] or [[Morphing|Morph]]: If 5 {{B|Decayed}} are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Losing|Lose]].

Vortex.name: Globe
Vortex.description: When all items within 2 spaces of this are [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Winning|Win]].

Waterfall.name: Droplet
Waterfall.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: If this is in the bottom row, [[Winning|Win]]. Otherwise, [[Morphing|Morph]] a random item in the row below into a {{B|Waterfall}}.

Wave.name: Wave
Wave.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Equipping|Equip]] all items to the right of this.

Whacka.name: Mole
Whacka.description:
On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] a random nearby [[Unequipping|Unequipped]] item into a {{B|Whacka}}.
If this is the third {{B|Whacka}} [[Equipping|Equipped]] consecutively, [[Winning|Win]].

Wine.name: Wine
Wine.description: If this item is [[Breaking|Broken]] while [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Revealing|Reveal]] 5 random items.

Wing.name: Wing
Wing.description: The next time you [[Equipping|Equip]] an item, this [[Swapping|Swaps]] with it.

WinSeeker.name: Winseeker
WinSeeker.description: Displays the number of nearby items that can make you [[Winning|Win]].

Winter.name: Snowman
Winter.description: On [[Equipping|Equip]]: [[Morphing|Morph]] 4 random other items into {{B|Ice|Snowflakes}}.

Worldbearer.name: Safe
Worldbearer.description: If this item is [[Breaking|Broken]] while [[Equipping|Equipped]], [[Losing|Lose]].
